title: Best of The Herd: 10/16/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 10/16/2018
description:
Colin looks past the Packers win and sees a team that, despite having Aaron Rodgers, is not a Super Bowl contender. He plays his NBA 3-word game and summarizes every team in the league using just 3 words as the season begins tonight. Plus, Eagles Offensive Lineman Lane Johnson comes on to defend himself against Colin's criticisms and talk about why fun can be more important than winning. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
